snippet: After joining the Web site, Prime Minister David Cameron clearly had not reckoned with the sharp, anarchic sense of humor it could unleash.
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron joins Twitter, and immediately attracts more than 80,000 followers; annoyed and restive ones unleash a torrent of mean and witty remarks.
lead_paragraph: After joining the Web site, Prime Minister David Cameron clearly had not reckoned with the sharp, anarchic sense of humor it could unleash.

headline.seo: David Cameron Joins Twitter, and Pith Follows
headline.main: Pith Follows British Leader on Twitter
headline.print_headline: Pith Follows British Leader On Twitter
